thread.section_title: LuxHair Wigs Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of LuxHair Wigs | www.luxhair.com | 2 of 5
thread.title: Elaine W
thread.title_full: LuxHair Wigs reviewed by Elaine W

author: Elaine W
title: Elaine W
text:
I had no qualms about the web page and ordering except I would like to choose a color and see a picture of that color on the style I'm considering. Would help somewhat when choosing color. Otherwise the ordering process was easy. I couldn't give it a 5 until I actually get my order. Excited hope I'm not let down.
UPDATE: I never received my order. I ordered 3 different styles. A couple of weeks after I ordered, I got an email saying my order was on back order with no delivery date. After another 2 weeks. I sent them an email canceling the order. Now I am waiting on my refund. S disappointed !!!
